name: ports
title: Port Manager
description: Monitor and manage open ports on your system with the ability to kill processes using specific ports.

commands.name: index
commands.title: Manage Open Ports
commands.description: Lists all open TCP/UDP ports on your system, allows you to view details, and terminate the process occupying each port with a single action. Helps free up ports quickly when developing apps or debugging software.
commands.subtitle: List, monitor, and kill processes by port

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: dleteliers_
